channel.title: Congratulations to Phaze One (Fuscate)
channel.description:
[url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=448771]Phaze one(fuscate)[/url] has earned the Builder award for his unfinished build [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/worldmap/?worldname=moparcraft&mapname=surface&zoom=6&x=-486.6514646138048&y=64&z=425.51628311684146]here.[/url]
Tom_BETA and I did a sweep of the map and we were impressed with the design and potential when we came across it.
So congratulations!

item.title: Congratulations to Phaze One (Fuscate)
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

i better hurry up on my sewer system then!

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations to Phaze One (Fuscate)
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m not sure if others will agree but I (personally) liked his place in bryans village as a whole, he also helped me try and design a place which turned out quite nice until it got burnt down by an angry mob.

I’m aware he helped others with their house design as well, I’m not saying you always need to be building a thousand and one structures just you need to built a recently and in the past, a very high standard was set by Tarkoff for this award considering he was the first one to obtain it.

I look for past work that YOU have done, not A did this, B did this, C did this I don’t believe in handing out awards to entire groups who built something unless it genuinely is huge, and I mean huge. Then I look for recent work you’ve done if they meet the high standard that was set then you’ll be considered.

Quite frankly, I don’t believe anything in W1 should be considered anyhow unless it was built recently. Zuppers also agrees with this.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations to Phaze One (Fuscate)
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:17, topic:433325”]The builder award isn’t just handed out if you make one nice place at one time, all people eligible must have had good style/creativity for a while and it must still be evident.

We also can’t exactly sweep W1 like we did with W2, considering W1 is massive and mostly griefed.[/quote]

In that case, what else has fuscate built that caught your (the staff’s) eye?

Im not trying to argue, nor am i saying fuscate isnt deserving of the builder award.

I know our castle is just 1 structure but its not the only thing we have built that has been complimented by many.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations to Phaze One (Fuscate)
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The builder award isn’t just handed out if you make one nice place at one time, all people eligible must have had good style/creativity for a while and it must still be evident.

We also can’t exactly sweep W1 like we did with W2, considering W1 is massive and mostly griefed.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratulations to Phaze One (Fuscate)
item.dc:creator: @deathwilldie0 deathwilldie0
item.description:
@deathwilldie0 wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:14, topic:433325”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=536045.msg3919367#msg3919367 date=1329541782]

Nope, the award is permanent - I will say Phaze has had stylish houses/buildings for a while but this one was really nice. People get the award when a member of staff thinks they deserve it, it’s then reviewed.

Blackcrest castle xd

Point. W1 wasn’t examined at ALL during that.
[/quote]

well most stuff built in w1 was built by now inactive members, so examining structures there isnt too hard[/quote]

Plus we have a video of it so I think that would easily justify examining it. I mean it shows almost everything in the video.

Read full topic
